properties.copyright: 1974 HeartWarming Music, Administered by Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing, Inc.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit flow through me
Holy Spirit flow through me
And make my life
What it ought to be
Holy Spirit flow through me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit rest on me
Holy Spirit rest on me
And use me Lord
To win the lost to Thee
Holy Spirit rest on me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit flow out from me
Holy Spirit flow out from me
That others Lord may see You in me
Holy Spirit flow out from me
